samirg:SamiTreeHole.NAME: Bosky Passage
DESCRIPTIONS: Enter the secret floor, and leave safely.

samirg:SamiTreeHoleBoss.NAME: BOSS in Bosky Passage
DESCRIPTIONS: Defeat a BOSS in Bosky Passage.

samirg:ToTalkWithMountains.NAME: To Talk with the Mountains
DESCRIPTIONS: Defeat Samivilinn. NL Cold and ice are merely manifestations of nature. How can the land invite you to face the unconventional enemy in the north if you can't even overcome this?

samirg:WinterFall.NAME: Winterfall
DESCRIPTIONS: Defeat "Eikthyrnir," the Scar of the Shattered. NL No matter what long-cherished aspirations this Sami hero once had, he is now but a collapsed symbol stripped of his selfâ€”just like the thousands of Ursus behind him.

samirg:LongIntoAnAbyss.NAME: Long into an Abyss
DESCRIPTIONS: Defeat Crazelyseon, the Ascendant of Cosmoi. NL It opens its vacuous eye, examining everything in this dimension. Only when the eye shuts will humanity get to chance a glimpse at the secret beyond the ends of the earth.

samirg:WhatBeginsFollowsWhatEnds.NAME: From Start to End
DESCRIPTIONS: Defeat Kharanduu Khagan and Lugalszargus. NL The footnotes of time have been removed, and the strife bears no fruit. Their war will continue on, but where will you go?
